Hyperspace::DirEntry

Hyperspace::DirEntry Struct Reference

Listing information for each node within a directory. More...

Public Attributes

std::string name
 Directory entry name.
bool is_dir
 Boolean value indicating whether or not this entry is a directory.

Detailed Description

Listing information for each node within a directory.

A vector of these objects gets passed back to the application via a call to Readdir()
